description: Manage and configure IoT Central schedule job.

commands.name: az iot central scheduled-job create
commands.summary: Create a scheduled job by ID.
commands.syntax:
az iot central scheduled-job create --app-id
                                    --content
                                    --group-id
                                    --id
                                    --schedule
                                    [--api-version {2022-06-30-preview, 2022-07-31}]
                                    [--batch]
                                    [--batch-type {number, percentage}]
                                    [--cancellation-threshold]
                                    [--cancellation-threshold-batch]
                                    [--cancellation-threshold-type {number, percentage}]
                                    [--central-api-uri]
                                    [--desc]
                                    [--job-name]
                                    [--token]

commands.name: az iot central scheduled-job delete
commands.summary: Delete an existing scheduled job by ID.

commands.name: az iot central scheduled-job list
commands.summary: Get the list of scheduled job definitions in an application.

commands.name: az iot central scheduled-job list-runs
commands.summary: Get the list of job instances for a scheduled job definition.

commands.name: az iot central scheduled-job show
commands.summary: Get details about a scheduled job by ID.

commands.name: az iot central scheduled-job update
commands.summary: Update a scheduled job by ID.
commands.syntax:
az iot central scheduled-job update --app-id
                                    --id
                                    [--api-version {2022-06-30-preview, 2022-07-31}]
                                    [--batch]
                                    [--batch-type {number, percentage}]
                                    [--cancellation-threshold]
                                    [--cancellation-threshold-batch]
                                    [--cancellation-threshold-type {number, percentage}]
                                    [--central-api-uri]
                                    [--content]
                                    [--desc]
                                    [--group-id]
                                    [--job-name]
                                    [--schedule]
                                    [--token]
